name: DuskSounds
0:
”Alexa open Dusk Sounds”
”Alexa ask Dusk Sounds to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: dusk sounds
des:
Relish the serene and tranquil sounds of dusk. From the gentle chirping of crickets to the distant hoot of an owl, these sounds capture the peaceful transition from day to night, helping you to relax and unwind.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Dusk Sounds
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
